body:
Overview

Once your Event is over, the homepage serves as your central hub for all the Event-related Insights. It provides access to the candidate funnel information and the event leaderboard, allowing you to observe candidate distribution across gender, country, and work experience. These distribution charts illustrate the registration or attempt-based breakdown based on your Event's status.

Â 

Note: You will see only registration-related information before the event has started and see the attempt-related information after the event has started.
title: View Event Stats
